data.name: The Coin Game Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Coin Game FREE DEMO is just a SMALL SAMPLE of the new ticket redemption arcade from devotid Media. The demo scene takes place during the final stages of filming the new trailer for the Full Version of The Coin Game. You will start the demo scene with a few bucks to play some machines and get an idea of how things work around Islandville. Watchout for the rent a cop as he can be quite a pain sometimes. Please consider buying the full version and support the future development of The Coin Game.



The Coin Game Free Demo features two arcade game classics. An original style coin pusher and SkeeBall. Two old time favorites in the ticket arcade arena. The free demo also has a ticket counting/eating machine, so there is plenty in the demo scene to give you an idea of the controls and gameplay of The Coin Game. You can play The Coin Game Demo with any mouse, keyboard or dual stick/pad controller. The demo game includes an easy to use key mapping system to support virtually any controller or peripheral. So you can play The Coin Game Demo any way that you like.

The Coin Game is developed by a one man indie developer over the last 2 years with the wonderful support of his wife, family and 2 weiner dogs.

data.short_description: The Coin Game Limited Demo is a sneak peek of devotid's newest Virtual Coin Arcade. The demo has 3 ticket redemption machines set in the middle of filming the final trailer for game launch. Check out the full game for many more machines and a complete island Arcade Adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6900 Series or Better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 @ 2.7 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6900 Series or Better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Intel i7 @ 2.7 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or Ubuntu 16.04 or 17.04
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6900 Series or Better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
